name: NHL 96
overview: The Puck Stops Here! Strap on your helmet and cinch up your skates because this is ice hockey, not nice hockey, a fast and furious all-out assault on your senses, where breakaways are met with bone-quaking body checks and the five hole looks more like a buttonhole. Skate faster, stop quicker, line it up and let it fly - this is the ultimate in breakneck, blistering sports action!
